Posts.Content: Thank you for your kind words made me smile. Have a lovely day x
Posts.Title: DIEP surgery in south east

Posts.Content: Hi I am waiting for a date on my Diep surgery I am worried for many reasons. Does any have personal input that could help me please? I am having my surgery in Wexham I would appreciate any comments about the place or the surgery and indeed the recovery. Thank you for sharing your experiences. Marina
Posts.Title: DIEP surgery in south east

Posts.Content: Thank you very much for sharing. It’s very comforting to know that others have successfully completed this long surgery. I have a young son and I am concerned that I will not be able to play, interact with him for a period of time after the surgery but I shall have to face that. Hope all goes well with the shaping later in the year.Â
Posts.Title: DIEP surgery in south east

Posts.Content: Thank you for all the input. It really helps to know what I will be facing, will take myself shopping (any excuse really) and talk to my BC nurse. X
